properties.description: Any initial article that should not be used for filing or database searches (e.g. "a", "an", "the").
properties.title: Non Sort

properties.description: A word, phrase, character, or group of characters that contains the remainder of the title information after the title proper.
properties.title: Subtitle

properties.description: The date the resource was created in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: DATE CREATED

properties.description: The start date in a range, input in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: START DATE

properties.description: The end date in a range, input in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: END DATE

properties.description: Use the ISO 639-2 English name of the language: http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php
properties.title: Language Text

properties.description: Use the ISO 639-2 code for the language: http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php
properties.title: Language Code

properties.description: A statement of the number and specific material of the units of the resource.
properties.title: Extent

properties.description: The method by which a resource achieved digital form
properties.title: Digital origin

properties.description: Enter the coordinates in degrees, e.g. 19 53 58 N, 102 07 59 E.
properties.title: Coordinates
